title: ChunkFormer: Masked Chunking Conformer For Long-Form Speech Transcription
author: Khanh Le (ZaloAI, Vietnam), Tuan Vu Ho (ZaloAI, Vietnam), Dung Tran (Independent Researcher), Duc Thanh Chau (Ho Chi Minh City University of Science), Duc Thanh Chau (Vietnam National University, Ho Chi Minh City)
relevance_why: The paper focuses on improving long-form speech transcription efficiency which can inform similar techniques in audio-generation and restoration tasks, relevant to Dr. Liu's ongoing work in audio processing.
background: The task involves automatic speech recognition (ASR) for processing long audio sequences efficiently to minimize hardware resource usage and improve transcription accuracy.
contribution: ChunkFormer introduces an efficient chunk-wise processing model to solve the limitations of current ASR systems, achieving a significant decrease in memory consumption and enhanced transcription accuracy.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous ASR models struggle with long inputs due to excessive memory usage and execution time, primarily reliant on padding for variable length audio.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work improves by implementing masked batching without padding, allowing longer audio durations to be processed efficiently on low-memory GPUs.

key_innovation: The introduction of a masked batching technique that eliminates unnecessary padding, thus optimizing the use of available computational resources.
real_world_impact: ChunkFormer’s architecture potentially enables cost-effective scaling for industrial ASR applications, making it feasible to process extensive audio data with minimal resource allocation.
limitations: No explicit limitations were mentioned by the authors.

new_terms.masked batching: **Masked batching** refers to a technique in processing variable-length audio inputs in batches without padding, effectively addressing the inefficiencies of standard batching methods.

open_sourcing: The implementation and pre-trained weights on public datasets are available at github.com/khanld/chunkformer
